properties.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 4 at 1:30PM PST until January 6 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 65 mph
expected.

* WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains.

* WHEN...From noon Sunday to 3 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as
trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will
be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds will be east of San
Marcos Pass.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 3 AM PST MONDAY
